tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EquipmentMaintenance (
   equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
   maintenance_date DATE,
   maintenance_description TEXT,
   performance_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE Equipment ( 
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50), 
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50), 
  purchase_date DATE, 
  maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100) 
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(100),
    performance_value FLOAT,
    measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    type TEXT,
    technician TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  performance_date DATE,
  performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
  performance_value INT
)

CREATE TABLE imaging_tests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  test_type VARCHAR(50),
  test_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE technicians (
  technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technician_name VARCHAR(50),
  technician_specialty VARCHAR(50),
  technician_certification VARCHAR(50),
  technician_experience_years INT
)
